PackageOracle.name: DA_LOC
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_LOC
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.59.154524000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_loc;

body.name: DA_LOC
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_LOC
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.59.167997000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc.add(fx), parms=' || loc_nm || '|' || parent_location_id || '|' || loc_externally_owned_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || loc_owner_party_id || '|' || loc_currency_cd || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || loc_start_dttm || '|' || loc_end_dttm || '|' || channel_type_cd || '|' || loc_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_loc a
(
a.loc_id
,a.loc_nm
,a.parent_location_id
,a.loc_externally_owned_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.loc_owner_party_id
,a.loc_currency_cd
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.loc_start_dttm
,a.loc_end_dttm
,a.channel_type_cd
,a.loc_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_loc_id.NEXTVAL
,add.loc_nm
,add.parent_location_id
,add.loc_externally_owned_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.loc_owner_party_id
,add.loc_currency_cd
,add.time_zone_cd
,add.loc_start_dttm
,add.loc_end_dttm
,add.channel_type_cd
,add.loc_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.loc_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc.add, parms=' || loc_nm || '|' || parent_location_id || '|' || loc_externally_owned_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || loc_owner_party_id || '|' || loc_currency_cd || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || loc_start_dttm || '|' || loc_end_dttm || '|' || channel_type_cd || '|' || loc_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_loc a
(
a.loc_id
,a.loc_nm
,a.parent_location_id
,a.loc_externally_owned_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.loc_owner_party_id
,a.loc_currency_cd
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.loc_start_dttm
,a.loc_end_dttm
,a.channel_type_cd
,a.loc_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_loc_id.NEXTVAL
,add.loc_nm
,add.parent_location_id
,add.loc_externally_owned_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.loc_owner_party_id
,add.loc_currency_cd
,add.time_zone_cd
,add.loc_start_dttm
,add.loc_end_dttm
,add.channel_type_cd
,add.loc_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,loc_nm IN VARCHAR2
,parent_location_id IN NUMBER
,loc_externally_owned_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,loc_owner_party_id IN NUMBER
,loc_currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc.add, parms=' || loc_id || '|' || loc_nm || '|' || parent_location_id || '|' || loc_externally_owned_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || loc_owner_party_id || '|' || loc_currency_cd || '|' || time_zone_cd || '|' || loc_start_dttm || '|' || loc_end_dttm || '|' || channel_type_cd || '|' || loc_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_loc a
(
a.loc_id
,a.loc_nm
,a.parent_location_id
,a.loc_externally_owned_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.loc_owner_party_id
,a.loc_currency_cd
,a.time_zone_cd
,a.loc_start_dttm
,a.loc_end_dttm
,a.channel_type_cd
,a.loc_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.loc_id
,add.loc_nm
,add.parent_location_id
,add.loc_externally_owned_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.loc_owner_party_id
,add.loc_currency_cd
,add.time_zone_cd
,add.loc_start_dttm
,add.loc_end_dttm
,add.channel_type_cd
,add.loc_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc.del, parms=' || loc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_loc a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.loc_id = del.loc_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc.del');

END del;

END da_loc;
